Name: Verify the user is able to see the FD option available on the header sign up
Expected Result: User should land on the Home page of the application
"FD" option should be available on the header

All the items on the list should be visible to the user (Apply FD, Download TDS Certificate, Download Interest certificate, Fixed Deposits, Benefits, FD Interest rate, FD Caluculator, Documents, FAQ's)

Name: Verify if the user is able to navigate to the "FD Interest Rate" landing page
Expected Result: User should land on the Home page of the application
"FD" option should be available on the header

All the items on the list should be visible to the user (Apply FD, Download TDS Certificate, Download Interest certificate, Fixed Deposits, Benefits, FD Interest rate, FD Caluculator, Documents, FAQ's)
User should be redirected to the details page

Name: Verify the details of the page
Expected Result: User should land on the Home page of the application
"FD" option should be available on the header
All the items on the list should be visible to the user
User should be redirected to the details page

Below elements/components should be present on the page
1. Title 
2. Description
3. A chart showing interest rate

test script - Steps: Check color, size, alignement and text of the title
Expected Result:
The color, font size, alignment of the title should be as per requirement
The text should be "Benefits"

test script - Steps: Check color, size, alignement and text of the description
Expected Result: The color, font size, alignment of the description should be as per requirement
